page.title: 06Population- Shevington Vale
page.content: A survey was undertaken on the Shevington Vale housing estate in Appley Bridge to ascertain some facts about the current population. Questionnaires were distributed to 508 households, and 316 were collected - a return of approximately 62%. These are the findings:- 53 people (9%) were actually born in Appley Bridge, while 544 people (91%) had moved into the area. Reasons for moving onto the estate were given as follows:- Housing(price, size, layout &) 323 The area(rural locality) 341 Near to motorway 157 Near to work 131 Close to family 96 Other reasons 11
